name: Dhiraj G
feedback: Good coaching institute in Pune. Got job within 3 months of training. Cheers !!

name: Vaibhav
feedback: I had never thought that I will become software test analyst and get job but Gravity has made it for me. Syllabus is well designed to focus on maximum hands on which helped to gain confidence to crack interviews. Highly recommended if looking to make career in software industry.

name: Sayali
feedback: Learned a lot from Gravity ! Although a fresher, gravity helped me to groom into truely working professional. Experienced industry trainers who guides you right from teaching till placement.

name: Suraj
feedback: I was not sure if I had made the right choice by joining the testing course . But Gravity surpassed my expectations. They are truly Best Of best in teaching , the kind of quality you can expect in any top Testing institute . I am glad I made this choice, definitely recommend to people interested in Testing (Manual + Automation) career.

name: Sneha
feedback: I was looking for best corporate training institute in Pune and then came across Gravity corporate training center, now I can say, joining Gravity was one of my best decision as I got my first job within 3 months of training. Best part of this institute I like is practicle exposure to therotical concepts. Experienced industry professionals are always there to guide you throughout course. One to One mentorship is something makes this institute unique.

name: Pankaj G
feedback: I was worried about my career as I was jobless but Gravity helped me to overcome this by getting me dream job. I am doing exceptionally well in my professional career and I thank Gravity for this. Got to know industry expectations beforehand through coaching done by industry experienced professionals which helped to crack interviews. Join Gravity today to get your dream job !!
